Imports

../core/types, ../core/transform

Types

CubeCoord = tuple[x, y, z: int]
HexCoord = tuple[q, r: int]
HexGrid = ref object of Node
  layout*: HexLayout
  nodes*: Table[HexCoord, HexNode]
HexLayout = ref object
  orientation*: HexOrientation
  size*: Vec2
  origin*: Vec2
HexNode = ref object of Node
  coord*: HexCoord
  layout*: HexLayout
  fill*: Option[Paint]
  stroke*: Option[Paint]
  strokeWidth*: float32
HexOrientation = enum
  PointyTopped, FlatTopped

Consts

flatOrientation = FlatTopped
hexDirections = [(1, 0), (1, -1), (0, -1), (-1, 0), (-1, 1), (0, 1)]
pointyOrientation = PointyTopped
